title: wards
body: my essence collector ward has disappeared from my ward popup menu when in champ select. should i be worried? was this supposed to happen lol?

replies.body: I've heard a few players mentioning this today, but it *does* look like the ward is still unlocked on your account. For now, I'll pass this along to the dev team, but also be sure you report this as Bug Report through the client too!
